name: Get off my lawn (nashmishah)
description:
Get Off My Lawn is a 2D top-down survival game. The player can control a character and the player needs to defend their home from being invaded by people who are trying to, as the title suggests, trying to invade your lawn.

As of now, there are only five items that can be used in the game, but will be added in the future updates.

The player can control the player character with WASD keys and move around to beat up the intruders of your lawn. There are step-by-step instructions in the game that will detail pertinent parts for the game.

This is just a prototype of a game, or rather the skeleton of it. A lot more things will be changed and added in the future. Please leave a comment if you have tried this game, and have a nice day.
